title: having trouble connecting to the server
body: I am form Bangladesh and I use North American server to play the game but everytime I'm trying to sign in it keeps saying unable to connect to server

replies.body: Since your network is trying to connect to the game servers from such a long distance, you may be experiencing  an unstable connection due to routing.  You may be able to troubleshoot through our [Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Keep in mind that the NA server is intended to service North America so I can't guarantee improvement beyond those limitations.
